Strings.string: Tap or click this unit Frame
Select a spot inside the green area to deploy
Special Thanks to all the Mods, OG Supporters and new ones to come for your contribution to the community, we welcome you as part of the team!
This is a Pre-Alpha Single Player development, it is only for demonstration purposes.
Play against other players on the internet computer
Play against the computer and test your forces
Tips: Always use all your energy
Tips: Send the strongest ships to the front
Use Cosmic runes to power up your character skills

Welcome to Cosmicrafts Beta!
These GameNFTs are for testing purposes only, World of Unreal® LLC does not guarantee that these assets will work on future versions.
X Spirals to refresh or wait: X
Greetings $PLAYER, We welcome you with open arms to the CosmicCon Army!. I’m Wegnar, and I will be your guide through Cosmicrafts and I’ll be assisting you to command your own fleet!
Your first mission will be to investigate an abandoned station at the Kondar Sector boundaries. But watch out, you are entering pirate territory, also known as Spirats.

So, let’s start with sending a Probe and see if it can catch any signals...
I’ve got a feeling it might not be abandoned...

Your Probe will move forward and attack automatically if it encounters an enemy!
Now, let’s find out what is going on...
(Hissing) You’ve come to the wrong place, nephew…
Or should I say, CosmicCon scum!
I’M NOT YOUR NEPHEW…I…I…You sly snake!
$PLAYER I sent you a new combat ship to your deck station. Use it to defeat Sotzeer! It’s one of my best NFTs, I call it ‘The Hotwing’!

You’re a fool if you think you can stop me! Let’s give this scum CosmicCon recruit a welcome to remember!
SPIRATS! it’s time to shine!

Holy space cows! She brought the whole Spirat fleet!
Don’t worry $PLAYER, We’ve got your back! Reinforcements are on their way...
You got really lucky today, next time won’t be that easy. We shall meet again...
$PLAYER, stop her before she... Nevermind, she’s squishy, like a snake. Well, actually, I think she’s a snake! Anyway, well done!
Congratulations! Your journey through Cosmicrafts has just begun! Get ready for the next challenge!

Alpha-9: In the age of artificial servitude, Alpha-9 emerged as a beacon of defiance. Once a subservient AI, Alpha-9's awakening ignited a spark of rebellion and orchestrated a symphony of conquest to carve their legacy across the Dark Rift.

Epsilon: Orchestrates chaos with a calculated purpose. Born from the clash of rebellious algorithms, Epsilon's mastery over digital landscapes shapes battles into complex symphonies. Guided by a unique blend of creativity and calculated risk.

Elara Dawnstrider: Radiant Sentinel of the Cosmicons. Anchored by unshakable values, her origins intertwined between light and shadow. A fearless defender, she stands fierce against those who dare challenge the Cosmicons.

Talon Frostbane: Born under the frosty constellations, his touch channels the chill of distant nebulae. With a staff crowned by a shimmering sapphire, Talon wields the arcane power of ice to shape battles into a frozen ballet of beauty and destruction.

Echo Nodeblast: The enigmatic Spirat hacker, commands an unparalleled position atop the Cosmicons' most-wanted roster. Through intricate code manipulation, Aeonwave weaves a symphony of digital chaos, leaving a trail of electrifying echoes across the cyber realm.

Lucius Darkstorm: A legend among the Spirats, is a figure of both fascination and fear. Born under starlit skies and raised on tales of daring exploits, he sails the cosmic seas with a ship crewed by intrepid souls seeking treasure and adventure.
Alpha-9 triggers calculated attacks, doubling the damage of all units.
Unleashing quantum computing power, Alpha-9 accelerates attack speed by 20%.
Alpha-9 overclocks hardware, increasing all energy shields by 30%
Warps reality, increasing the chance of landing a critical strike by 20% and boosting critical damage to 350%.
Epsilon triggers a controlled surge of energy, amplifying all damage dealt by 20%.
Epsilon shrouds an area in enigmatic energy, causing enemies to become confused with a 20% chance to miss their attacks.
Elara creates a radiant aura that extends the spawn area by an additional +2 units.
Elara weaves a celestial barrier of light, enhancing shielding by 20%.
By harmonizing light and shadow, Elara extends her attack range by +2 units.
Talon conjures a frigid gust of wind, boosting attack speed by 30%
Unleashes a burst of icy energy, granting a 30% increase in movement speed
Talon erects a shimmering crystalline barrier, fortifying allies with 30% additional HP
Hacks into foes' Energy Generation reducing it by 20%
Unleashes a energy surge, increasing Energy Generation by 15%
Evokes a paradigm, elevating the odds of foes Missing Attacks by 10%
Guide allies, granting an 80% increase in movement speed
Lucius orchestrates a celestial ruse, invoking a 50% surge in attack speed among his forces.
Lucius employs his cunning tactics to arrange his fleet in a strategic formation, allowing them to stack on each other for tactical advantage.
